name: Forklore
description:
Forkore is a friendly restaurant management game where your aim is to run a successful business, and at the same time maintain a good relationship with the local community!



You’ve inherited you grandmother’s run-down restaurant in Clementine, so you move there with the scope of reviving the long-forgotten, but still magical place.

You leave your city with a few coins and with the hope of beginning a new life full of adventures and opportunities.

Managing a business




Turn your old restaurant into a major tourist destination. Learn the habits of your guests and capitalize on them!

  • Spend your money wisely and be thoughtful because your restaurant’s reputation is the key for success.

If you make wrong decisions, your business will feel the consequences. Be wise, and your place will blossom in no time!

Aiming for progression




Make your restaurant stand out by creating a unique atmosphere for your guests!

Progressing in Forklore will let you discover new areas:

  • Learn new recipes, buy a building contract, renovate your restaurant, or acquire rare items, like jukebox CDs!
  • New skills and power-ups are also important, since they have an impact on your efficiency and day-to-day life.

Along your journey, you will unlock a lot of new perks, and you will learn how to combine them in a way that maximizes their advantages!

Being part of a community




Clementine’s residents are eager to meet you. Some of them were good friends with your grandmother, some of them are just as young as you!

  • There are over ten locals in Clementine, and you can learn something from each one of them. Humans are different: they have unique personalities, interesting habits, and weird quirks!

Who will be your best friend in Clementine? Maybe you’ll learn new stuff about your grandparents, too!

Organizing your life




Take some time out for yourself and restore your energy. Go fishing, chill out in the park or chat with the locals, because there’s more to life than work.

  • Go to sleep in time, so the next day you won’t feel exhausted. Catch rare fish and create expensive, special meals. Visit the church on Sundays, maybe consider donating.

Live your own life, follow your goals and progress in your own pace. Every step you take will make a difference, that’s for sure!
